title: Ceiling Fan, Dishwasher, Laundry Facilities
posting_body: ['This beautiful pet-friendly apartment community has everything you are looking for including a recreation room, fitness room, two sparkling pools two jacuzzi’s, three elevators, onsite laundry, assigned parking, and controlled access entry.', 'Unit amenities include air conditioner, ceiling fan, stove, dishwasher, full kitchen, spacious closet, full bath, and a private patio!', 'Perigee Apartments are located near Lanark Park, Canoga Park Library, Vons Market Target and Limerick Avenue School.', 'Contact us today and let our friendly and professional leasing team help you find your new dream home at Perigee Apartments in Canoga Park!', '-On-Site Management', '-Full Stainless Appliance Package', '-Laundry Facilities', '-Carpeting and/or SPC flooring in units', '-Elevator', '-Covered Parking', '-Air Conditioner', '-Ceiling Fan', '-Modern/Upgraded Cabinets and Countertops', '-Disposal', '-Spa/Hot Tub', '-Dishwasher', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>']
